statements: SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM emergency_contacts WHERE relation = 'Family';
SELECT id, email FROM emergency_contacts WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT relation, name, phone_number FROM emergency_contacts ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts WHERE id = 5;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM emergency_contacts WHERE relation = 'Family';
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM emergency_contacts WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' AND relation <> 'Friend';
SELECT id, email, relation FROM emergency_contacts WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, phone_number FROM emergency_contacts ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT email FROM emergency_contacts WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY breach_date DESC;
SELECT breach_id, location FROM security_breaches WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts;
SELECT name, email FROM emergency_contacts WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM security_breaches ORDER BY breach_date DESC;
SELECT description, location FROM security_breaches WHERE location <> 'Unknown' ORDER BY breach_date;
SELECT name, phone_number, address FROM emergency_contacts WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmergencyContacts;
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone FROM EmergencyContacts WHERE relationship='Family';
SELECT contact_name, relationship FROM EmergencyContacts WHERE contact_phone LIKE '555%';
SELECT * FROM SecurityBreaches ORDER BY breach_date DESC;
SELECT breach_location, breach_description FROM SecurityBreaches WHERE breach_id=3;
SELECT * FROM EmergencyContacts;
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone FROM EmergencyContacts WHERE relationship = 'Family';
SELECT contact_id, contact_name, relationship FROM EmergencyContacts WHERE contact_phone LIKE '(555)%';
SELECT * FROM SecurityBreaches ORDER BY breach_date DESC;
SELECT breach_id, breach_location, breach_description FROM SecurityBreaches WHERE breach_location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY breach_id;
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts;
SELECT name, email FROM emergency_contacts ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT phone_number FROM emergency_contacts WHERE name='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM security_breaches WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT location, time FROM security_breaches ORDER BY time ASC;
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM emergency_contacts WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND email <> 'example@example.com';
SELECT * FROM security_breaches WHERE location = 'Data Center' AND severity > 5 ORDER BY time DESC;
SELECT contact_logs.timestamp, contact_logs.description, emergency_contacts.name FROM contact_logs JOIN emergency_contacts ON contact_logs.contact_id = emergency_contacts.id;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) AS num_incidents FROM response_teams JOIN security_breaches ON response_teams.location = security_breaches.location GROUP BY team_name ORDER BY num_incidents DESC;
SELECT * FROM emergencies;
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone_number, contact_email FROM emergencies;
SELECT incident_type, incident_location, incident_timestamp FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_timestamp DESC;
SELECT responder_name, responder_role FROM responders WHERE responder_role = 'Paramedic';
SELECT notification_type, notification_message, notification_timestamp FROM notifications WHERE notification_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM emergencies ORDER BY contact_name DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT contact_name, contact_relationship FROM emergencies WHERE contact_phone_number LIKE '%123%'
SELECT contact_email, contact_relationship, contact_name FROM emergencies JOIN responses ON emergencies.id = responses.incident_id WHERE responses.response_status = 'Active'
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE incident_location = 'Hospital' AND incident_type = 'Medical'
SELECT * FROM responders WHERE responder_role IN ('Paramedic', 'Dispatcher') ORDER BY id ASC
